org.openscience.smsd.algorithm.mcsplus
Class MCSPlus

java.lang.Object
  org.openscience.smsd.algorithm.mcsplus.MCSPlus

@TestClass(value="org.openscience.cdk.smsd.SMSDBondSensitiveTest")
public class MCSPlus
extends java.lang.Object

This class handles MCS plus algorithm which is a combination of c-clique algorithm and McGregor algorithm.

Author:
Syed Asad Rahman
